mutants.mutated_line: words = re.findall('', text.lower())
mutants.code:
from typing import List, Tuple
import re
from collections import Counter

def word_count_analysis(text: str) -> List[Tuple[str, int]]:
    words = re.findall('', text.lower())
    stop_words = {'the', 'and', 'or', 'but', 'for', 'as', 'in', 'are', 'is', 'can', 'these', 'a', 'an', 'to', 'of', 'on', 'at', 'with', 'by', 'from', 'it', 'its', 'that', 'this', 'there', 'which', 'who', 'what', 'where', 'when', 'how', 'why', 'not', 'no', 'yes', 'true', 'false'}
    word_counts = Counter((word for word in words if word not in stop_words))
    sorted_word_counts = sorted(word_counts.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)
    return sorted_word_counts

mutants.mutated_line: word_counts = Counter((word for word in words if word not in stop_words))

from typing import List, Tuple
import re
from collections import Counter

def word_count_analysis(text: str) -> List[Tuple[str, int]]:
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', text.lower())
    stop_words = {'the', 'and', 'or', 'but', 'for', 'as', 'in', 'are', 'is', 'can', 'these', 'a', 'an', 'to', 'of', 'on', 'at', 'with', 'by', 'from', 'it', 'its', 'that', 'this', 'there', 'which', 'who', 'what', 'where', 'when', 'how', 'why', 'not', 'no', 'yes', 'true', 'false'}
    word_counts = Counter((word for word in words if word not in stop_words))
    sorted_word_counts = sorted(word_counts.items(), key=lambda x: x[-1], reverse=True)
    return sorted_word_counts
